topic.title: Need help to write the perfect command line system to install ZN
topic.body:
Hello,

I need help to write the perfect command line installation for ZN not using tails...

my problems : 

1. how to use apt-transport-tor
2. how to connect zn only on tor at launch

Goal is to be able to post on the clear and darknets the perfect command line instruction to install zeronet.

here is my current proposal for a non tails linux :

sudo apt update
sudo apt upgrade
sudo apt install tor
sudo nano /etc/tor/torrc
remove "#" from those 2 lines
control port 9051
cookieauthentication 1

ctrl + x
y
enter

wget https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet-linux/archive/dist-linux64/ZeroNet-py3.linux.tar.gz
tar xvpfz Zeronet-py3.linux64.tar.gz

sudo usermod -a -G debian-tor ((your username))

restart machine to apply (sudo reboot)

cut internet

cd ZeroNet-linux-dist-linux64/
./ZeroNet.sh

config > always tor

close browser 
ctrl+c (the command line window)

repeat : 
cd ZeroNet-linux-dist-linux64/
./ZeroNet.sh

"you are now in a cryptographically certified trasheable id..."

........

okay I understand that it's a chicken and egg problem to want to install apt-transport-tor or something similar to dl zeronet from github...

but I don't like to have persitant data attached to a tails install and would prefer to have something more robust.

all help appreciated.


I really need to understand how to install and how apt-transport-tor works, and if it works with wget...

yes I am a noob

but I think this little once finished guide will be useful to a lot of prisonners of the digital goolags.

thanks a lot for your time and maybe even help :).


have a nice day.
